content: shuppet the puppet pokemon it eats up emotions like malice jealousy and resentment so some people are grateful for its presence materials blue-gray yarn crochet hook 1 size below what s recommended for the yarn polyester filling tapestry needle felt light blue dark blue yellow brown for the eyes hot glue for the felt scissors for yarn & felt abbreviations magic_ring = magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet increase = increase 2 single_crochet in 1 stitch decrease = decrease stitch 1 single_crochet into 2 stitches incdc = increase using double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch
